alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 09 at 4:01PM EDT until September 09 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Coastal southeast Georgia and South Carolina. * WHEN...Until Midnight EDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of moderate to heavy rain showers and embedded thunderstorms will produce an average of 1 to 3 inches of rainfall across coastal SC and GA through this evening. Some of this heavy rainfall will likely occur near the time of this evening`s high tide which could exacerbate flooding concerns. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be prepared to protect life and property, especially in areas prone to flooding. If flooding develops, move to higher ground immediately. If driving, be prepared for flooded roadways and possible road closures.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper
